snippet: First baseman Mark Teixeira, who has had a cough for about a month, was found to have nothing more serious than severe congestion in his bronchial passageways.
abstract: First baseman Mark Teixeira, who has had a cough for about a month, was found to have nothing more serious than severe congestion in his bronchial passageways.

headline.main: Teixeira Receives Good News About Cough
